turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need to order a drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a ice caramel macchiato form Starbucks the one at 1816 South Mildred in Tacoma, Washington.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what size did you wantA?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I Can I get a grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and what kind of milk did you want to use?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and that was a caramel macchiato right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. so I have a grande iced caramel macchiato with 2% milk for the starbucks on south mildred, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. I've placed your order and you'll recieve the reciept via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a nice day.
